BBEX3.A.HRK.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Croatia / USD 1 = HRK ... (middle)
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: Since October 2010: Croatian National Bank, Zagreb. 1995 - September 2010: Zagrebacka Banka, Zagreb.
Methodology: Until 2000 and from 2006, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates, 2001 to 2005 calculated on the basis of daily buying and selling rates.
